Package gui.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IScreenController
    Interface defining methods for controlling the screens in the application.
    IThreadController
    Interface for defining common functionalities related to thread management.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateReportsScreenController
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions related to report generation.
    CustomerHomepageScreenController
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions on the customer homepage screen.
    CustomerScreenController
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions on the customer screen.
    EmployeeHomepageScreenController
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions on the employee homepage screen.
    EmployeeScreenController
    Controller class responsible for managing the UI interactions on the employee screen.
    HandleOccasionalVisitorScreenController
    Controller class for handling occasional visitor requests and processing new occasional visits.
    HandleOrderScreenController
    Controller class for handling order management operations, such as canceling, confirming, and updating orders.
    IdenticationScreenController
    Controller class for the Identification Screen.
    LandingPageScreenController
    LandingPageScreenController is a controller class that handles the landing page screen of the GUI application.
    MakeOrderScreenController
    Controller class for the Make Order Screen.
    ManageGuidesScreenController
    Controller class for managing guides in the system, including approving pending guides.
    OrderSummaryScreenController
    Controller class for the Order Summary screen.
    ParkAvailableSpotsScreenController
    Controller class for the Park Available Spots screen.
    ParkEntranceScreenController
    Controller class for the park entrance screen in a theme park management system.
    ParkSettingsScreenController
    Controller class for the Park Settings screen, responsible for managing park settings such as estimated visit time, reserved entries, and maximum capacity.
    PaymentReceiptScreenController
    Controller class for the Payment Receipt screen, responsible for displaying the payment receipt details.
    RequestTableScreenController
    Controller class for the Request Table screen, responsible for managing and displaying requests.
    RescheduleOrderScreenController
    Controller class for the Reschedule Order screen, responsible for managing the rescheduling of orders.
    ViewReportsScreenController
    This class is responsible for controlling the view reports screen in the application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ControllerType
